channel.title: The Project on Network Communities of the Social Sciences
channel.description: Recent content in The Project on Network Communities of the Social Sciences

item.title: Datasets
item.description: Data # Here we have the datasets which we have used for the project. The Wikipedia Lists # Here we link to the five social science lists, which our project is build upon. Sociologists Psychologists Political Scientists Economists Anthropologists Here we have the different datasets which we used for the project. To load the data into python, we suggest you use the following code-snippet:

item.title: Louvain Modularity
item.description: Louvain Modularity # We optimize modularity based on the Louvian Partition Algorithm, which is: \[ \Delta M=\left[\frac{\sum_{in}+2k_{i,in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}+k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] - \left[\frac{\sum_{in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}}{2W}\right)^2 - \left(\frac{k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] \] Is used to make these networks
